com.axelor.studio.service.wkf

Class WkfDesignerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.axelor.studio.service.wkf.WkfDesignerService

  • public class WkfDesignerService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service class handle bpmn xml processing of workflow. It create/remove workflow nodes and transitions using bpmn xml. *
    Author:
    axelor

      • processXml

        public void processXml(Wkf instance)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Method fetch bpmn xml from workflow. It generate document from xml using dom parser. From dom document generates transitions and call method to creat nodes. *
        Parameters:
        instance - Workflow instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
